text: Avdon () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Avdonsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 5263 as of 2017.Численность населения Российской Федерации по муниципальным образованиям на 1 января 2017 года There are 20 streets. == Geography == It is located 19 km from Ufa. == Ethnicity == The village is inhabited by Tatars, Russians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Avdon, Russia
